name: Personalized Coffee Mug
description: Start your day with a smile! This ceramic coffee mug can be personalized with names, quotes, or special messages. Perfect for coffee lovers and makes a thoughtful gift for any occasion.

name: Vanilla Scented Candle Set
description: Create a cozy atmosphere with this set of 3 vanilla-scented candles. Made from natural soy wax, these candles burn cleanly for up to 40 hours each. Perfect for relaxation and home decoration.

name: Premium Dark Chocolate Box
description: Indulge in luxury with our premium dark chocolate collection. 12 pieces of handcrafted chocolates with various fillings including caramel, nuts, and fruit flavors.

name: Leather Bound Journal
description: Capture your thoughts in style with this elegant leather-bound journal. Features 200 lined pages, elastic closure, and a ribbon bookmark. Perfect for writers, students, or professionals.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Stay hydrated in style with this 500ml stainless steel water bottle. Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and eco-friendly.

name: Canvas Tote Bag
description: Eco-friendly canvas tote bag perfect for shopping, beach trips, or daily use. Features reinforced handles and a spacious interior. Available in natural beige color.

name: Professional Colored Pencil Set
description: Unleash your creativity with this 48-piece colored pencil set. High-quality pigments provide vibrant colors and smooth application. Comes with a wooden storage box.

name: Floral Print Wristlet
description: Stylish floral print wristlet perfect for carrying essentials. Features multiple card slots, zippered coin pocket, and detachable wrist strap. Compact yet functional.

name: Minimalist Leather Wallet
description: Sleek and minimalist leather wallet crafted from genuine leather. Features RFID blocking technology, 6 card slots, and a bill compartment. Perfect for the modern professional.

name: Wooden Keychain Set
description: Set of 3 handcrafted wooden keychains with different shapes: heart, star, and circle. Can be personalized with initials or short messages. Made from sustainable bamboo.

name: Ceramic Travel Mug
description: Double-wall ceramic travel mug with silicone lid and sleeve. Keeps beverages hot for hours while remaining comfortable to hold. Dishwasher safe and leak-proof design.

name: Lavender Aromatherapy Candles
description: Set of 4 lavender-scented aromatherapy candles designed to promote relaxation and better sleep. Made with essential oils and natural soy wax. Burns for 30+ hours each.

name: Gourmet Milk Chocolate Truffles
description: Luxurious milk chocolate truffles dusted with cocoa powder. Each box contains 9 pieces of melt-in-your-mouth goodness. Perfect for special occasions or as a sweet treat.

name: Spiral Bound Sketchbook
description: High-quality spiral-bound sketchbook with 120 pages of heavyweight paper. Perfect for pencil, charcoal, and light watercolor work. Durable cover with elastic closure.

name: Insulated Sports Water Bottle
description: 750ml insulated sports water bottle with flip-top lid and carrying loop. Features measurement markers and wide mouth for easy filling. Perfect for gym and outdoor activities.

name: Vintage Style Messenger Bag
description: Vintage-inspired canvas messenger bag with leather accents. Features padded laptop compartment, multiple pockets, and adjustable shoulder strap. Perfect for work or school.

name: Watercolor Paint Set
description: Complete watercolor paint set with 24 vibrant colors, brushes, and mixing palette. High-quality pigments provide excellent color saturation. Includes portable carrying case.

name: Metal Keychain with LED Light
description: Practical metal keychain with built-in LED flashlight. Compact design with bright white light perfect for finding locks in the dark. Durable aluminum construction.
